entities.name: crouch

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Mr. Crouch's well-being and asks if he is all right.
Krum is looking down at Mr. Crouch in alarm, indicating that he is also concerned about his well-being.
Harry and Krum are together in the trees, with Harry looking at Mr. Crouch and Krum looking down at him.
Dumbledore is being called for to assist with Mr. Crouch's situation, indicating that he has some expertise or authority in this area.
